bug.author: yazabaza
bug.description: See; tensorflow.org/versions/r0.7/tutorials/mnist/beginners/index.html --> Training section. "Math Processing Error" appears in multiple places in page. Used OSX / Safari, Firefox, and Chrome. Screen shot attached. <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/351870/13761735/a3f2a3b6-e9f7-11e5-9373-5b7eb37fd534.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: It looks like the encoded apostrophes are causing problems for rendering on OS X. Perhaps replacing them with ^\prime would work? Assigning to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/martinwicke>@martinwicke</denchmark-link> since he knows the website generator better than I do.

Closing this as a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1377>#1377</denchmark-link> . We're working on a fix and it should be in soon - as a workaround for now, you can right click on the equation and select the SVG renderer.
